revised_title: Flame Spectra and Photometrical Investigation of Flames
tldr: The authors conducted a photometrical investigation of flames colored by injecting saline solutions, discovering new spectral lines of metals in the flames' spectra. They extended the study to the ultra-violet portion of the spectrum and detected weak lines using photography. The research involved a modified apparatus for automatic operation during long exposures and the use of diffraction gratings and prism spectroscopes for analysis.
